articles.title: Solar storm warning as 'CANNIBAL' turns skies blood-red after 'swallowing' second CME - Daily Express
articles.description: A DOUBLE WHAMMY of coronal mass ejections (CMEs) from the Sun has slammed into the planet, triggering an intense solar storm that painted the skies red with auroras.
